channel.title: Need Help
channel.description: i have made client and server, i can go on it and everything is ok but another players cant open client, when they try to open run.bat in client folder it doesnt opens, what should i do plz help me someone

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @ljoxaa ljoxaa
item.description:
@ljoxaa wrote:

it still the same, what can i do else? and maybe its not run bat fault?
like i did autodownload cache aswell maybe its something from that?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“ljoxaa, post:5, topic:412346”]i have changed that like
@echo off
Title Client
cd ./
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit
To
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
cause my bro had jre6 and still same thing, can i do something esle?[/quote]
You could also change the 500m to like about 800m or 100m.

Read full topic

exit
To

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“ljoxaa, post:3, topic:412346”]@echo off
Title Client
cd ./
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit
but i can run my client, but no one else[/quote]
The problem might be because of the JRE part, tell them to change the JRE7 part to their Java version.

Example: jdk1.6.0_26
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_26\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32

Read full topic
